comment.author: 35034346184@N01
comment._content: The caption says "5TH AVE EASTER '13" so presumably this is 1913, not 1910.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Edward  Vielmetti: Thanks for the information. We will update  the source data and reload the description.

comment.author: 17643926@N00
comment._content: The Easter parade, which today starts at St. Patrick's and goes on up to about 59th Street, was more extensive when this picture was taken. The parade must have extended all the way down to the 42nd Street Library--look at the sightseers. The parade has contracted and moved uptown over the years.
